    Function configureWorkerModule

    • configureWorkerModule(
          __namedParameters: ModuleInput<WorkerSettingsOptions>,
      ): Promise<
          {
              activeWorkTypes: () => Promise<string[]>;
              addWork: (__namedParameters: WorkData) => Promise<Work>;
              allocateWork: (
                  __namedParameters: { types: string[]; worker: string },
              ) => Promise<Work>;
              allocationMap: () => Promise<Record<string, number>>;
              count: (query: WorkQueueQuery) => Promise<number>;
              deleteWork: (workId: string) => Promise<Work>;
              ensureNoWork: (
                  __namedParameters: {
                      priority: number;
                      scheduleId: string;
                      type: string;
                  },
              ) => Promise<void>;
              ensureOneWork: (__namedParameters: WorkData) => Promise<Work>;
              findWork: (
                  __namedParameters: { originalWorkId?: string; workId?: string },
              ) => Promise<Work>;
              findWorkQueue: (
                  __namedParameters: WorkQueueQuery & {
                      limit?: number;
                      skip?: number;
                      sort?: SortOption[];
                  },
              ) => Promise<Work[]>;
              finishWork: (
                  workId: string,
                  __namedParameters: WorkResult<any> & {
                      finished?: Date;
                      started?: Date;
                      worker?: string;
                  },
              ) => Promise<Work>;
              getReport: (
                  __namedParameters: { dateRange?: DateFilterInput; types?: string[] },
              ) => Promise<WorkerReport[]>;
              markOldWorkAsFailed: (
                  __namedParameters: {
                      referenceDate: Date;
                      types: string[];
                      worker: string;
                  },
              ) => Promise<Work[]>;
              rescheduleWork: (currentWork: Work, scheduled: Date) => Promise<Work>;
              status: (work: Work) => WorkStatus;
              workerId: string;
              workExists: (
                  __namedParameters: { originalWorkId?: string; workId?: string },
              ) => Promise<boolean>;
          },
      >
